short_description: funds for good is a venture capital & investment firm based in brussels, belgium.
long_description: funds for good is a new kind of company based on a model of reasoned capitalism: funds for good impact , active in the financing and support of social entrepreneurs or those in precarious situations, is financed by funds for good invest , creator of sustainable investment funds, which returns the profits it generates through this activity. this is the choice of the founders of funds for good who believe that profit is a means of carrying out a project that goes far beyond the aim of enrichment of the shareholders of the company. the entire funds for good a team bring meaning to its business model and to the investments of its clientsâ€¦ by creating social and local impact. on one hand, large companies through their governance and their social responsibility policy, but also and above all, small companies which will offer disruptive models to help resolve our social and environmental challenges. funds for good invest has created a diversified range of high-quality, socially responsible funds, available through traditional distribution networks (banks, insurance companies).
business_tags: sustainable investments | social entrepreneurship | funds of funds | responsible investing | insurance company | micro financing | micro credit | equity loans | managed funds | concrete forming | volunteer coaches
generated_description: funds for good is a company that operates on a model of reasoned capitalism, focusing on financing and supporting social entrepreneurs and those in precarious situations. the company is financed by funds for good invest, which creates sustainable investment funds. funds for good invest offers a diversified range of high-quality, socially responsible funds available through traditional distribution networks. the company also helps entrepreneurs lacking financial resources to develop their projects, particularly those with social or environmental dimensions, by providing equity loans and offering free support from volunteer coaches and experts. funds for good aims to create social and local impact while ensuring profitability and quality of management.
